summary_comment: Wild Bill, a pilot by profession, is highly regarded for his engaging storytelling and humorous teaching style, making the class both enjoyable and relatively easy for students who read the books and pay attention. He is also praised for his inspirational presence, particularly in naval science, and is described as an all-around great person.

Ratings.comment: Wild Bill has the best stories and he's a pilot so that's pretty cool.  the class is pretty easy if you read the books and pay attention in class.
William Montgomery was inspiring in the field of naval science.  He also is a pilot. Which is is pretty cool.
Great teacher, inspirationAL man, hilarious and all around great person. Just remember your customs and courtesies!
